addTransaction(uint256[],uint256[],addre.details: Stores the data of a new transaction associated with the selling of products of a single manufacturer

params._productIDs: The IDs of the bought products
params._quantities: The quantities of the bought products

getBuyerTransaction(address).details: Returns all the transactions in which products were bought by a given user

getBuyerTransaction(address,uint256,uint.details: Returns all the transactions in which products were bought by a given user in a certain interval of time

params._fromDate: The date from which the interval ends

getSellerTransaction(address).details: Returns all the transactions in which products were sold by a given user

getSellerTransaction(address,uint256,uin.details: Returns all the transactions in which products were sold by a given user in a certain interval of time

params._fromDate: The date from which the interval ends

getTransactionData(uint256).details: Returns the data of a specific transaction

params._transactionID: The id of the transaction whose data to return

getTransactionVATTotal(uint256).details: Returns the amount of cubit spent as VAT in a given transaction

params._transactionID: The id of the transaction whose data to return

initialize(address,address).details: Initializes the contract saving the instances of the proxies of the contracts used by this contract
